title: foxglove.SceneEntityDeletion
description: Command to remove previously published entities

timestamp.title: time
timestamp.description: Timestamp of the deletion. Only matching entities earlier than this timestamp will be deleted.

type.title: foxglove.SceneEntityDeletionType
type.description: Type of deletion action to perform

oneOf.title: MATCHING_ID
oneOf.description: Delete the existing entity on the same topic that has the provided `id`

oneOf.title: ALL
oneOf.description: Delete all existing entities on the same topic

id.description: Identifier which must match if `type` is `MATCHING_ID`.

message_id.description: Unique identifier for this message (e.g., UUID7, ULID, or custom format)

lineage.title: foxglove.LineageInfo
lineage.description: Lineage information for tracking data provenance

items.title: foxglove.InputReference
items.description: Reference to an input message used in lineage tracking

topic.description: Topic name of the input message

message_id.description: Unique identifier of the input message (e.g., UUID7, ULID, or custom format)

inputs.description: References to input messages that contributed to this message

processing_node.description: Name of the processing node that produced this message

state.title: foxglove.StateReference
state.description: Optional reference to the state of the processing node

topic.description: Topic name of the state message

message_id.description: Unique identifier of the state message (e.g., UUID7, ULID, or custom format)
